attributes.action: Clear labeling for humanly slaughtered meat.
attributes.additional_details:
All meat and poultry or processed foods containing meat or poultry for either human or animal consumption to be clearly labelled to indicate if the animal was slaughtered in accordance with
The Welfare of Animals (Slaughter or Killing) Regulations 1995.  Excluding part iv (slaughter by a religious method). These meats poultry or processed  foods to be labelled ‘humanly killed meat’
Or according to part iv of The Welfare of Animals (Slaughter or Killing) Regulations 1995.
These Meats poultry or processed foods to be labelled ‘meat NOT humanly killed’
